testing.name: Ukrainian culture first half of the nineteenth century.

question.text: How many universities existed on Ukrainian lands in the first half of the nineteenth century.?
Who was the author of the collections "Little Russian Songs", "Ukrainian Folk Songs" that fond of contemporary Ukrainian and Russian intellectuals?
What year came the first edition of "Poet" Shevchenko?
Who was the author of the first literary work written in Ukrainian folk live?
What style of architecture prevalent in Ukraine in the first half of the nineteenth century.?
Who Ukrainian mathematicians launched Petersburg mathematical school?
